properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:36PM AKST until January 13 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Strong winds to 50 mph occuring. Snow and blowing snow
expected. Travel will be difficult. Areas of poor visibility are
expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, are
expected.

* WHERE...Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys north of Noatak Village.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Monday.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Monday. Strong winds are occuring tonight and
will continue into Monday. Falling snow will develop late
Sunday and continue into Monday. The lowest visibility will be
Sunday through Monday.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY
